result.reason: The behavior is verified, user-visible tab-order breakage, and reports confirm it still occurs on current DockPanelSuite tags, so reconnect logic should be fixed in mRemoteNG.
result.approach: Update reconnect to reuse the existing tab in place instead of closing and recreating it at the end, then add a regression test asserting tab index is preserved.
